verse.roman:
āsīt su-tumulaṁ yuddham
adbhutaṁ roma-harṣaṇam
kṛṣṇa-śaṅkarayo rājan
pradyumna-guhayor api

synonyms: āsīt—there occurred; su-tumulam—very tumultuous; yuddham—a fight; adbhutam—astonishing; roma-harṣaṇam—causing bodily hair to stand on end; kṛṣṇa-śaṅkarayoḥ—between Lord Kṛṣṇa and Lord Śiva; rājan—O King (Parīkṣit); pradyumna-guhayoḥ—between Pradyumna and Kārtikeya; api—also.
translation: A most astonishing, tumultuous and hair-raising battle then commenced, with Lord Kṛṣṇa matched against Lord Śaṅkara, and Pradyumna against Kārtikeya.
